DOC.brief_title: Does Letrozole Improve Outcomes and/or Reduce Cost IVF-ET Cycles ?
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aim : 1 . To determine whether addition letrozole gonadotropin would reduce amount gonadotropin use IVF-ET cycle , thereby reduce cost . 2 . To determine whether letrozole improves IVF-ET success compare standard ovarian stimulation protocol . Null Hypothesis : Use Letrozole ovulation induction IVF less expensive standard therapy clinically relevant amount . Alternative Hypothesis : Use Letrozole ovulation induction IVF well standard therapy clinically relevant amount . Protocol : Infertile woman < 40 year age age-appropriate ovarian reserve ( determined day2/3 E2 , FSH , AMH ) randomize two protocol : one letrozole one standard ovulation induction . In group , serum FSH measure time sample obtain estradiol . Sera frozen batch assay . Number embryo transfer decide follow ASRM guideline . The day embryo transfer ( D-3 v D-5 ) base number quality embryos per establish clinical criterion . Power Considerations A review 1473 cycle patient less 40 year old last 6 year ( 2002 - 2008 ) reveal average cost per cycle $ 3,152 +/- 1685 ( SD ) . For purpose power analysis consider 20 % decrease medication cost clinically significant . Thus decrease $ 3152.83 $ 2522.26 consider clinically significant ( 20 % decrease ) . For alpha 0.05 power 80 % two tailed test 113 patient need complete arm . Allowing 10 % drop-out attempt randomize 125 patient arm study .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Normal Ovarian Function 2 . Normal uterus 1 . Age 40 2 . Diminished ovarian reserve ( base marker and/or previous poor response ) 3 . Previous oophorectomy
